#labels Phase-Deploy
How to configure and use this plugin?

= Introduction =

The following document describes how you can configure and use this plugin.


= Installation =

Download the following plugins
  * [http://code.google.com/p/nb-reviewboard/downloads/detail?name=org-smartdevelop-reviewboard-diff.nbm&can=2&q= Vcs Diff Plugin]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/nb-reviewboard/downloads/detail?name=org-smartdevelop-reviewboard-svndiff.nbm&can=2&q= SVN Diff plugin]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/nb-reviewboard/downloads/detail?name=org-smartdevelop-reviewboard.nbm&can=2&q= ReviewBoard plugin]

  * Open your NetBeans IDE and go to _Tools->Options_
http://nb-reviewboard.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/tools.png
  * Navigate to _Downloaded_ tab
http://nb-reviewboard.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/downloaded.png
  * Select the downloaded nbm files
  * Follow the wizard instructions to complete the installation
